About Me
Hi, I am Ruikai Cui (崔瑞凯), a final-year Ph.D. student at The Australian National University (ANU), advised by Prof.  Nick Barnes, Prof.  Saeed Anwar, and Prof.  Hongdong Li. Before that, I received my bachelor’s degree in computer science from the ANU and Shandong University in 2021.
My research focues on 3D reconstruction and generation.
